name: Karen Berger - Connecticut - Pyramid 6x52
additionalNotes: K by Karen Berger is the only woman-owned and run cigar company in the industry, starting her cigar journey by taking a job in a local nicaraguan factory rolling cigars. The brand was founded by the wife  of cigar industry mainstay Don Kiki Berger with the goal of keeping his remarkable legacy alive. K by Karen Berger known for crafting some of the best budget-friendly Nicaraguan cigars on the market. K by Karen Berger is inspired and informed by some of the top names in modern cigar-marking.  That remarkable passion and inspiration are present in every cigar from K by Karen Berger.
